mapper.select: select * from product order by pdseq
select pdseq, frcode, bname, mname, pdname, price, pduploadfile, pdurl, hashtag, mucode1, mucode2, mucode3 from product where pdseq=#{pdseq}
mapper.insert: insert into product (pdseq, frcode, pdname, price, mucode1, mucode2, mucode3, hashtag, pduploadfile) values ((select nvl(max(pdseq), 0)+1 from product),${frcode},#{pdname},#{price},#{mucode1},#{mucode2},#{mucode3},#{hashtag},#{pduploadfile})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM product p JOIN menu m ON p.mucode1=m.mucode OR p.mucode2=m.mucode OR p.mucode3=m.mucode WHERE m.muname=#{muname} ORDER BY p.pdseq
